hadiths.text: Narrated Mu'awiyah al-Qushayri: I went to the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) and asked him: What do you say (command) about our wives? He replied: Give them food what you have for yourself, and clothe them by which you clothe yourself, and do not beat them, and do not revile them

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي حَقِّ الْمَرْأَةِ عَلَى زَوْجِهَا
chapter.eng-name: The Rights Of A Woman Upon Her Husband
